name: Knuckles In South Land
description:
Knuckles In South Island

Starting Knuckles The Echidna & My Sonic OC Name Pacha The Wolf

Date: January 1st 2020

Control

Arrow Keys To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Enter To Change Character

Story/Plot

Knuckles Was Leaving Angel Island To Go On A Trip Of Cusco To Visit Their Culture, When Landing There He Met A Wolf Name Pacha The Wolf And Pacha is a illama herder to Collect Illama To Take Good Care Of Them. And Collect Mask On His Desk.

Knuckles Asked Pacha To Go On Adventure With Him. Pacha Said Yes! Together They Enter To Explore The Land Of Cusco
